io.elegie.luchess.core.domain.moves

Class AbstractFigurineDirectionalMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.core.domain.entities.Move
      • io.elegie.luchess.core.domain.moves.AbstractMove
        • io.elegie.luchess.core.domain.moves.AbstractFigurineMove
          • io.elegie.luchess.core.domain.moves.AbstractFigurineDirectionalMove
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BishopMove, QueenMove, RookMove

    public abstract class AbstractFigurineDirectionalMove
extends AbstractFigurineMove
    This class represents a directional move: the piece is expected to move along one or many squares, in the same direction (horizontal, vertical or diagonal).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractFigurineDirectionalMove(Figurine figurine) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract Direction[] getDirections()
      Implementations should provide all directions to be explored, starting from the target.
      protected java.util.List<Vertex> getPossibleSources(Color color, Position position)
      Finds a list of candidate sources, by reading all directions from the target, and registering all pieces of the correct type and color.
